author: Omar Jimenez, CNN
title: Inside Chicago's refrigerated warehouse for bodies
description: It was a grim precaution. Now, it's an unimaginable reality.
content:
(CNN)It was a grim precaution. Now, it's an unimaginable reality. 
Just a 20-minute drive from the heart of downtown Chicago sits a refrigerated warehouse, which is now being prepped as a space to potentially store more than 2,000 bodies amid the increase in… [+4713 chars]
